name: Stand Rush
description: Choose an allied stand on the field to strike an opponent 3 times.
footer: ORA ORA ORA ORA ORA

name: Stand Strike
description: Choose an allied stand on the field to strike an opponent 1 time.
footer: Stands are mysterious beings which can be manifested from the souls and willpowers of humans.

name: Free Candy!
description: Kill an ally card to draw a stand user card.
footer: 'Hey kids we have some free candy!' - Jameson J. Jonah

name: Paradox Spit
description: Paradoxify an enemy card. If it is already paradoxified, afflict it with a random paradox.
footer: Paradox. A stand with the power of... contradiction?

name: Syringe with Golden Liquid
description: Give a normal card, a random stand.
footer: The power of a stand is quite strong, however not everyone is capable of wielding one

name: D10
description: Liberate a stand which can liberate.
footer: Liberation... An interesting concept pioneered by an... irritating man.

name: Donald's Zettaflare!
description: Deal 20 damage to an enemy character. If it has equipment, destroy that as well.
footer: Zettaflare!

name: Volume Mourning
description: Silence all cards that are not '5 Horsemen' cards
footer: And just like that, the room went silent. Can you believe that?

name: Sonic Cannon
description: Silence 2 enemies
footer: This guy's stand is quite fascinating I must say. Maybe he is worthy?

name: Bite
description: Deal 2 damage to a character
footer: 'Awww that Yorkshire Terrier is so cute!! Wait... why is it AHHHHHHHHHHHHHH' - Unlucky FBI soldier

name: Card Throw
description: Deal 3 damage to an enemy character and 2 damage to the enemy world
footer: 'That weird guy just threw a card at me like that is gonna do any-' knife to the throat

name: Mob Mentality
description: Give all allies +1/+1. If you have 5 or more allies, give them +2/+2 instead.
footer: The power of the mob is strong. It can make you do things you never thought you would do.

name: Soul Bomb
description: Deal 2 damage to an enemy character. If it is a stand, deal 4 damage instead.
footer: Soulsiology is a field of study in which only a couple are proficient in. As the man who invented the field, I can say that it is quite fascinating.

name: Fuck the police
description: Give all Federation of Bizarre Intelligence cards on the field -2 attack
footer: FUCK THE POLICE!!!!

name: Stand Lock: Point 1
description: Nullify a stand for 2 turns
footer: By stopping the stream from which the soul connects to the vessel, we are able to stop its existence and tangibility. I must say, I am quite impressed.

name: Stand Lock: Point 2
description: Nullify a stand for the rest of this match
footer: Of course... I am not going to let you use that stand again... Take this as punishment... sir.

name: A Child's Remorse
description: Kill a child, to give all allies +3/+3 this round
footer: I am sorry, but I must do this. I must do this for the greater good.

name: Glock
description: Deal 5 damage to an enemy character or the enemy world
footer: And for his neutral special he wields a gun.

name: Pinata
description: Summon 2 0/1 Children
footer: I am not sure what this guy is doing, but I am sure it is not good.

name: All for One
description: Deal 2 damage to the enemy world for every ally you have on your field
footer: Don't underestimate strength in numbers

name: Time Rupture
description: Deal 1 damage to the enemy world and all enemies for every turn that has passed
footer: The difference between man and animal... it's the desire to 'go to Heaven'. Humans think about it...However, dogs and parrots can't grasp this concept. The idea of 'Heaven'. Humans should spend their lives trying to attain 'Heaven'. That is the beauty of humans..

name: A Fated Encounter
description: **Unique** When I am added to your deck, double the amount of cards in the deck. Shuffle A 'Silver Key' into Your Deck. Draw 1 Card.
footer: Hey, I may sound crazy, but life's been... bizarre as of late, so I can't be too sure. You can't... speak english, can you?

generatedCards.name: Silver Key
generatedCards.description: Shuffle 'For Far Too Long' into your deck. Draw 2 cards. Every time you draw cards, your World heals 1 Health.

generatedCards.name: For Far Too Long
generatedCards.description: I can only be played when you have no cards in your deck. Obliterate all enemies and obliterate the enemy world.

name: Vampiric Bite
description: **Vampiric** Deal 2 damage to an enemy character.
footer: O Negative it seems. Quite delicious I must say.

name: Depression
description: Make a character strike themself

name: Inevitability
description: Kill a character
footer: Pyotr... please tell me that this letter is not true. He isn't dead right?? Please PLEASE PLEASE!!!!
